<title level="1" pfs="">[Ancient Rivener](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1675)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Ikeshtis who eschew their society are exiled and quickly devolve into violent creatures known as riveners.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ikeshti_AncientRivener.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Ancient Rivener](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1675)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Ikeshti" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=420" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 86</row>

**Perception** +25

**Languages**
[Ikeshti](/Languages.aspx?ID=96); (can speak and understand only simple words)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +25, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** -3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Violent Instincts** An ancient rivener attacks the nearest creature when [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) instead of any other effect, and ignores magical commands compelling them to do anything other than attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 35 

**Fort** +27 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +22 

</row>

**HP** 280

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 15, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 15, [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 15

**[Ferocity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=16)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +29 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+14 piercing and 2d8 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 3d8+14 slashing

**Slaughter Tackle** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The ancient rivener Leaps at a target within 30 feet, and then makes one jaws Strike and one claw Strike in any order.

**Squirt Blood** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The ikeshti squirts blood from one of their eyes at a target within 30 feet. The target must attempt a DC 18 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure).

</column>
